title: Wise Rabbit- Livestock Investment
description: Farmers & citizens suffer from a lack of liquidity & investment due to an unstable, inflationary currency, resulting in poor food security.
solution: Africa-centric, micro-investment through a blockchain ADA wallet. Investment through a familiar practice known to Africans, that is farming.
experience: Existing crowd-funded piggery, supported by 200 investors. Seasoned software developer is a co-proposer with an existing digital app wallet
